title: Facebook Ads in 2026: The AI Era

lessons.title: Introduction to AI-First Advertising
lessons.description: How Agentic AI has redefined the ad landscape in 2026.
lessons.summary: In 2026, Facebook Ads are no longer just about manual targeting. This lesson covers the shift to 'Operating Layer' marketing where AI agents manage bid strategies, creative variations, and cross-platform orchestration autonomously.

quiz_questions.question: What is the primary role of AI in 2026 advertising?

lessons.title: Advantage+ Pro & Autonomous Campaigns
lessons.summary: Deep dive into Meta's Advantage+ Pro suite. Learn how to set goals and let the AI handle the rest, from budget allocation to creative swapping in real-time.

quiz_questions.question: What replaces manual targeting in Advantage+ Pro?

lessons.title: Objective-Driven Workflows
lessons.summary: Moving beyond 'Traffic' and 'Sales'. We explore new 2026 objectives like 'Brand Resonance', 'Agentic Handover', and 'Immersive Conversion'.

lessons.title: Zero-Click Commerce
lessons.summary: How to structure campaigns when the 'buyer' might be a personal AI assistant. Optimizing data feeds for machine readability.

quiz_questions.question: Who is the new 'gatekeeper' consumer in 2026?

lessons.title: Metaverse & AR Placements
lessons.summary: Strategies for placing non-intrusive, interactive 3D ads within Horizon Worlds and Apple Vision Pro environments.

lessons.title: Text-to-Video Ad Generation
lessons.description: Creating high-fidelity video ads in minutes.
lessons.summary: Using Meta's internal GenAI tools to produce thousands of creative variations from a single product link. Best practices for prompting the ad creative engine.

lessons.title: Predicting Churn with AI
lessons.description: Stopping customer loss before it happens.
lessons.summary: How 2026 analytics dashboards use predictive modeling to flag at-risk customers and automatically trigger retention ad campaigns.
